net.windward.RoboRally

Class PlayerTurn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.windward.RoboRally.PlayerTurn

  • public class PlayerTurn
extends java.lang.Object
    A requested move for a player's turn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerTurn

        public PlayerTurn(java.util.List<Card> cards,
          boolean powerDown)
        Return your turn. If you have locked cards will only use the first N (unlocked) cards returned. If you do not return enough cards, random cards will be assigned. Locked cards are the last N cards from the previous turn.
        Parameters:
        cards - Your unlocked cards.
        powerDown - true if power down at the end of this turn.

    • Method Detail

      • getCards

        public final java.util.List<Card> getCards()
        The cards requested for the upcoming turn. If your Damage is greater than 4 then not all 5 of these will be used, but you may return 5. The extras will be ignored.

      • getIsPowerDown

        public final boolean getIsPowerDown()
        Return true to power down at the end of the upcoming turn. You also need to return Cards because the power down occurs AFTER this turn!

      • addElement

        public final org.dom4j.Element addElement(org.dom4j.Document parent)
        Create the XML of the turn.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        User friendly display.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        User friendly display.
